M3 has offices in Japan, UK, France, Germany, Brazil, Sweden, China, USA, and South Korea, as well as India.
   

  

**About The Business Division**
 This role is part of
 **QQFS** 
 , a Gothenburg based fieldwork agency and a wholly owned subsidiary of M3 Inc. QQFS is a leading provider of data\\-collection services for the pharmaceutical and healthcare industry. **Job Description**
 As an Account Executive, you are the key player on the accounts assigned to you, maintaining regular client contact, and acting as an ambassador of QQFS. You will be accountable for the preparation and delivery of client bids and with this excellent client service.
   

  

 The client will seek your advice, trust your judgement, and value your opinion. You will have enthusiasm for your client’s business bringing your knowledge and expertise to bear in QQFS work.
   

  

 As a Account Executive, you should be competent in putting together bids for your clients; establishing feasibility, competitive pricing, ensuring timescales are met and the business is best placed to support the client. You will be expected to demonstrate initiative and be proactive in developing your accounts.
   

  

**Essential Duties And Responsibilities**
 Including, but not limited to the following:
   

  

* You will develop a strong relationship with your assigned accounts, develop and grow each account as per your objectives
* You are responsibility for the bids allocated to you. You will respond to these bids in a timely manner and log them properly in the MR system
* You will follow and understand the pricing and feasibility grid, timeline recommendations, have a good understanding of the client’s business and seek advice from the fieldwork team for market specifics in order to provide the best possible and accurate bids.
* You will follow up on bids, keep a record of the outcome and if needed discuss change of strategy with the Managing Director.
* You will prepare client contracts based on template and reviewing accuracy of client commissioning documents
* You will ensure excellent project delivery by working with and providing guidance to the fieldwork team, this involves briefing the project team on project and client specifics. You will also provide support in escalations
* You will work together with the sales team to deliver the company goals.
* You should look at current processes and practices and suggest improvements to the Managing Director.
* Prepare client contracts based on template and reviewing accuracy of client commissioning documents
* Actively network within existing and new client contacts for any new business/prospects
